name: JWA Flight School
about: JWA Flight School, located at Clow Airport in Bolingbrook, is a dynamic and family-friendly flight training institution. We operate under FAA Part 61 regulations, offering flexible training courses that accommodate your schedule. Our team of knowledgeable FAA-certified flight instructors has thousands of combined flying hours, ensuring you receive top-notch training. We provide a range of services, including discovery flights, online scheduling, and the use of the Redbird LD Flight Simulator for advanced training. Additionally, our full-service FBO includes self-serve and full-serve fuel options, as well as comprehensive aircraft maintenance services. At JWA Flight School, we are committed to making your flight training experience both enjoyable and effective.
